Piękne wspomnienia
The old feel of Team Fortress Series, this really needs official port for Source Engine!

The Smash Bros. Melee of the series. As in: 
-Not for everybody
-More Complicated
-Buggier
-Looks Horrible

And Also
-Faster
-More Fun
-More Technical 
-Very Competitive

Even though it has a lot of problems, this game is SO MUCH FUN and has a wonderful community, if you like fast and technical games this is for you.

Old Time...

Мне игра не понравилась.
1. В неё как и в Day of defeat играют одни старики, выносящие вас с одного выстрела из дробовика, когда вы из дробовика максимум кого можете убить - это себя, ведь дробовик - неиграбельный кусок г*вна , который в упор не может убить за 5 выстрелов.
2. Игра для меня слишком быстрая (в некоторых моментах она показалась мне быстрее Quake 3 arena) и невозможно соореентироваться.
3. Когда тебе сносят половину хп гранатой в шутерах - это раздражает, правда? А здесь тебя за большинство классов выносят с 1 гранаты, брошенной в 10 метрах от тебя.
4. Онлайна почти нету, а если и есть, то это старики, которые играют здесь с 1999 года.
По моему мнению, если ты не хардкорщик (мазахист), то в этой игре тебе делать нечего.

...yeah. It's not great.

Team Fortress Classic is very clearly a product of it's time. The guns feel like they do NO damage, the maps are confusing, and the actual gamemodes feel poorly-cobbled-together. Every server either runs 2Fort, Dustbowl, or is completely empty. 

Just play Team Fortress 2. That game, the guns feel powerful, the maps are easily comprehensible, and the gamemodes feel polished.

In conclusion, unless you have nostalgia for this, don't buy it or play it. Chances are, if you own it, you got it with Half-Life Complete for some god-forsaken reason. Get Counter-Strike, it's way better.

Bardzo fajnie zobaczyć grę będącą protoplastą jednej z moich ulubionych produkcji Valve - Team Fortress 2. Po chwili grania odnalazłem sie w rozgrywce. Mógłbym określic tą grę jako miks CS 1.6 i Team Fortress 2. Co prawda nie ma ekwipunku i zróżnicowanych broni (ani tym bardziej sprzętu kosmetycznego), ale podstawy rozgrywki są analogiczne do sequela. Do tego można ograć niektóre mapy, które stanowiły wzór dla kontynuacji (np. 2Fort).

For anyone reading this review, I think you'll like this game. I have been playing Team Fortress 2 for a while now, and I am a big an of older games. So I decided to pick up the gam for myself. Got to say, great game! I don't think it should $5, but still it's great.

игра очень хорошая я рекомендую это друзьям или другим людям так как это заменяет conter strike 1.6  плюсы хорошие карты графика (хоть раньше это крутая графа) крутые классы  карты гранаты и пушки (минусы) Актив (он очень сильно упал) и в неё трудно играть за шпиона и инженера.Игра просто супер рекомендую вам ребята

Вы что сделали с кс 1.6?

Absolutely awfull. I was going to play this to give it a try, and i was kinda of surprised that it was paid. As i remember it being once a free game. Well, i tried it. And regreted it. I don't know what i was expecting really, but the game is just awfully boring and repepetitive. Not to mention the fact that it barely has any servers, and most of them are weird maps and not the actual maps from the game itself. 
Please don't throw your money into the trash just to play this, i understand that some people might be nostalgic. But if your going to try it out, for the first time, wanting to experience it. Don't try it. Your lucky if you have it for free, if it was free. I'd definitely give it a good review, but for it being paid with that ammount. No.

It's TF2 but old, it's different to regular TF2 due to the grenades, different weapons, mechanics etc. If you are ready to learn and enjoy a new TF experience, i would definetly recommend this game to you. But if you are happy with TF2's mechanics and weapon system and you think TFC is way unbalanced, just stick to TF2.

Team Fortress Classic is exactly like Team Fortress 2, except in an older engine and a different art style. There are very few populated servers remaining but It's still worth having in your library when it goes on sale, and a fun time when you can find a server.
